```{r}
library(fpp)
library(fpp2)
library(forecast)
kings <- scan("http://robjhyndman.com/tsdldata/misc/kings.dat",skip=3)
kingsTM <- ts(kings)
plot(kingsTM)
ndiffs(kingsTM)
tsdisplay(kingsTM)
kingsTMDF <- diff(kingsTM, differences=1)
plot(kingsTMDF)
tsdisplay(kingsTMDF)
auto_fit <- auto.arima(kingsTM, trace=TRUE, stepwise = FALSE)
auto_fit
attributes(auto_fit)
plot(forecast(auto_fit,h=5,level=c(99.5)))

Acf(auto_fit$residuals)
Box.test(residuals(auto_fit), lag=20, type="Ljung")
plot.ts(residuals(auto_fit))
hist(auto_fit$residuals)
tsdiag(auto_fit)


plot(euretail)
nsdiffs(euretail)
ndiffs(euretail)
ndiffs((diff(euretail,4)))
tsdisplay(diff(diff(euretail,4)))
fit3 <- auto.arima(euretail,trace=TRUE, stepwise = FALSE )
fit3

Acf(fit3$residuals)
Box.test(residuals(fit3), lag=20, type="Ljung")
plot.ts(residuals(fit3))
hist(fit3$residuals)
tsdiag(fit3)

```
